events.title: Meet the Author: Patricia Cooper
events.description: Join us for an intimate evening with Patricia Cooper as she discusses her latest work and signs copies of her books.
events.author: Patricia Cooper

events.title: Book Club: The Edge of Tomorrow Discussion
events.description: Monthly book club meeting to discuss 'The Edge of Tomorrow'. New members welcome!

events.title: Children's Story Hour: Winter Tales
events.description: Magical winter stories for children ages 4-8. Hot chocolate and cookies provided!

events.title: Writing Workshop: Crafting Your First Novel
events.description: Award-winning author Thomas King leads an intensive workshop on novel writing techniques, character development, and plot structure.
events.author: Thomas King

events.title: Science Fiction Book Launch: Beyond the Stars
events.description: Celebrate the launch of Emily Davis's thrilling new science fiction novel with readings, Q&A, and refreshments.
events.author: Emily Davis

events.title: Poetry Reading: Voices of the City
events.description: An evening of contemporary poetry featuring local poets. Open mic session to follow.

events.title: Mystery Book Club: January Meeting
events.description: Discussing this month's selection from the mystery genre. Coffee and snacks provided.

events.title: Historical Fiction Panel Discussion
events.description: Three acclaimed historical fiction authors discuss research methods, historical accuracy, and bringing the past to life.

events.title: Teen Book Club: YA Fantasy Adventure
events.description: Book club for teens ages 13-17. This month we're exploring young adult fantasy novels.

events.title: Author Q&A: Rachel Scott on Thrillers
events.description: Join bestselling thriller author Rachel Scott for an engaging Q&A session about her writing process and career.
events.author: Rachel Scott

events.title: Self-Publishing Seminar
events.description: Learn about self-publishing options, marketing strategies, and distribution channels for independent authors.

events.title: Summer Reading Kickoff 2026
events.description: Launch our summer reading program with activities, prizes, and book recommendations for all ages.
